channel.title: Error connecting to server. Must be down
channel.description:
Error connecting to server. Must be down.
It says this every time i try to join a server how come? i cant join any servers :/

item.title: Error connecting to server. Must be down
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Tainted Mod Tainted
item.description:
@Mod_Tainted wrote:

chunky516:

Remember not all serevers have same port so chek dat, and make sure u chek the ip and if thats not working prehaps the server is not 24/7

…well said guy…lol
